name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 Mini Island / ミニミニアイランド / 迷你島
detailed_description:
Everything is so much better mini-sized! Mini cans of soda... Miniature golf... Chibis... In the Mini Island DLC, players can battle mini versions of monsters! While these monsters are smaller, and have less HP, they definitely pack a punch, so be careful! You can even gain more experience points than regular monsters! Go deeper into the Mini Island dungeon for even MORE EXPERIENCE!

How to Unlock in-Game: Mini Island can be unlocked from Chapter 8. The dungeon is unlocked through plans.

This dungeon and the enemies that appear in this dungeon (Mini Island) are the same for Rebirth1, Rebirth2, and Rebirth3.

short_description: Mini Island DLC introduces an island dungeon filled with miniature monsters, but with more experience points to gain!

fullgame.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 / 超次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth1 / 超次次元遊戲戰機少女重生1

supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version. On-board graphics card are not recommend. Highly recommend to have an independent graphics card.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or 8 (64bit) or newer
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version
